categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Westro was a Human male captain of the Forty-second Imperial Infantry who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.

During the Sacking, Westro led a number of Imperial soldiers inside the Jedi Temple to attack the Jedi under Darth Malgus' command. He was able to kill a Jedi in the back until he received a couple of scars during the firefight. Westro was considered to be the bravest Imperial.
